text: Madina Nalwanga (born February 2, 2002) became famous for her lead role in Disney's Queen of Katwe. The film depicts the life of Phiona Mutesi, a Ugandan girl living in a slum in Katwe. For her role in the film, she won most promising actor award at 2017 Africa Movie Academy Awards in Lagos, Nigeria. ==Early life== Born in the poor Kampala's slum of Katwe, she spent their childhood selling corn on the streets of Katwe. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kampala Category:African actors
title: Madina Nalwanga
